title: Circle Watch
summary: Minimal watch face for Android Wear
description: We created this minimalistic watch face being inspired by the idea of labyrinth. These circles are bewitching, aren’t they?Features★ Dark and light themes ★ Ability to display seconds ★ Current date, day and month★ Wear battery indicatoradvantages:- rich assortment of colorful themes,- automatic activation of the watch screen to review applied changes, - optimized for different densities,- low battery usage due to optimization,- up to 2 days of continuous performancecompatibility: - Compatible with all Android Wear devices - NOT compatible with Samsung Gear and smartwatches using other operating systems - Recommended for round clock★How to install★Once you have installed from the Google Play, you may be asked to grant permissions for the app on your phone - be sure to approve all permissions. Once the app has installed on your phone, it may take 5-10 minutes to transfer over to your watch and the Android Wear app. Please be patient. Once installed, simply long press on your watch face to bring up the selection menu, or select this watchface from the Android Wear app. Use the accompanying settings app to configure the settings and optionsThis face is built to the latest google services if you’re not updated it triggers the update on your watch. The face will be installed on your watch after it finishes installing the updates. Please contact us directly if you have any questions about this watch face: epicbot.lab@gmail.comThanks!
descriptionHTML:
We created this minimalistic watch face being inspired by the idea of labyrinth. These circles are bewitching, aren’t they?

Features

★ Dark and light themes
★ Ability to display seconds
★ Current date, day and month
★ Wear battery indicator


advantages:
- rich assortment of colorful themes,
- automatic activation of the watch screen to review applied changes,
- optimized for different densities,
- low battery usage due to optimization,
- up to 2 days of continuous performance


compatibility:
- Compatible with all Android Wear devices
- NOT compatible with Samsung Gear and smartwatches using other operating systems
- Recommended for round clock

★How to install★
Once you have installed from the Google Play, you may be asked to grant permissions for the app on your phone - be sure to approve all permissions. Once the app has installed on your phone, it may take 5-10 minutes to transfer over to your watch and the Android Wear app. Please be patient. Once installed, simply long press on your watch face to bring up the selection menu, or select this watchface from the Android Wear app. Use the accompanying settings app to configure the settings and options

This face is built to the latest google services if you’re not updated it triggers the update on your watch. The face will be installed on your watch after it finishes installing the updates.

Please contact us directly if you have any questions about this watch face: epicbot.lab@gmail.com

Thanks!
comments: This should easily be a 5 star face as it looks AMAZING but unfortunately it lacks the basic functionality of a 12 hour mode. When I first tried this app in the morning I was convinced this was my favorite face but into the afternoon I saw the 24 hour time and was disappointed. It has a wonderful amount of color customizations though but ultimately fails in the most basic area of simply displaying the time. I would think the aspect of displaying the time would be the first area of customization.
